title: The Cabin: One Stormy Weekend
description: Saving a someone is one thing, but nursing a handsome and irresistible guy back to health is another...A snowstorm is coming and that may not be the only thing Sacha Price will have to contend with.Trapped with a stranger.Adam is reserved and careful with women. He's been burnt repeatedly. His savior, Sacha, is everything good and all the things bad. She's married. Being alone with this beautiful woman calls for two cups of strength, and a tablespoon of chastity.Can they resist temptation?The Cabin has just gotten heated.
author: Sheri Mello
